DOC.detailed_description: The Mom2Baby Pilot study last 4 month . Up 20 pregnant woman consider normal weight prior pregnancy enrol study . The infant bear pregnant woman also enrol birth . Archive blood , archive breast milk , clinical assessment data 20 participant consider overweight obese enrollment Expecting Success study conduct Pennington Biomedical Research Center ( NCT01610752 ) may use test primary hypothesis well additional hypothesis . We measure level LC-PUFAS , pro-inflammatory biomarkers , regulatory hormone ( resistin , ghrelin ) serum ( 35,0-36,6 week gestation 4,0-7,6 week postpartum ) breast milk ( 4,0-7,6 week postpartum ) normal weight ( n=20 ) overweight obese ( n=20 ) mother . Blood serum plasma breast milk level measure compare pregnancy postpartum within normal weight overweight obese woman . Additional maternal procedure include questionnaire , anthropometrics , body composition measurement , energy intake measurement , physical activity measurement investigate 35,0-36,6 week gestation 4,0-7,6 week postpartum . Infant procedure include anthropometrics , body composition measurement , stool collection , energy intake measurement investigate 0,1-0,6 week 4,0-7,6 week postpartum .
DOC.criteria: Female Pregnant ( prior 36 week gestation ) singleton viable pregnancy Not diagnose gestational diabetes 2nd trimester current pregnancy determine 2nd trim oral glucose tolerance test 18‐40 year age Normal weight ( 18.5 ≤ BMI ≤ 24.9 kg/ m2 ) prior pregnancy English speaking Willing complete 3 clinic visit Pennington Biomedical Research Center Willing enroll infant study infant deliver Intend breastfeed provide breast milk infant infant least 2 month age Willing study staff contact primary care doctor provide prenatal care current pregnancy obtain information prenatal medical record , labor delivery record medical record infant birth Recent history currently smoke Recent history current alcohol drug abuse Not willing complete 3 clinic visit Pennington Biomedical Research Center Not willing enroll infant study infant deliver Not plan breastfeed provide breast milk infant prior 2 month age Plans move study area within study period Not willing avoid pregnancy 2 month follow delivery Prior plan ( within 1 year expect delivery ) bariatric surgery Enrollment study previous pregnancy Known fetal anomaly current pregnancy History preterm birth Planned termination adoption infant current pregnancy History 3 consecutive first trimester miscarriage Hypertensive ( SBP > 160 mmHg & DBP > 110 mmHg ) Diabetic diagnosis prior pregnancy History current psychotic disorder , major depressive episode , bipolar disorder , eat disorder Diagnosis HIV AIDS Diagnosis severe anemia ( Hb < 8g/dL and/or Hct < 24 % ) Current use one follow medication : Metformin , Systemic steroid , Antipsychotic agent ( e.g. , Abilify , Haldol , Risperdal , Seroquel , Zyprexa ) , Anti‐seizure medication mood stabilizer would expect significant impact body weight ( e.g. , Depakote , Lamictal , Lithium , Neurontin , Tegretol , Topamax , Keppra ) , Medications ADHD include amphetamine methylphenidate . Continued use weight loss medication include OTC dietary supplement weight loss ( e.g. , Adipex , Suprenza , Tenuate , Xenical , Alli , conjugate linoleic acid , Hoodia , Green tea extract , Guar gum , HydroxyCut , Sensa , Corti‐slim , Chromium , chitosan , Bitter orange )
